snippet: International comedians — from Cuba to Nigeria to Saudi — describe how they have coped with their political angst for years....

byline.original: By ADAM B. ELLICK, MONA EL-NAGGAR and TAIGE JENSEN

lead_paragraph: International comedians — from Cuba to Nigeria to Saudi — describe how they have coped with their political angst for years.

headline.main: How to Cope With Trump? Laugh
